actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act, to allow the Secretary of Agriculture to make loans to farmers and ranchers to refiance their debts secured by liens on their real property not to exceed the lesser of the market value of the property of $1 million.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act, that the Secretary of Agriculture make loans to farmers, ranchers, and oyster planters to refinance their debts secured by liens on their real property not to exceed the lesser of the market value of the property or $1,000,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act, to allow the Secretary of Agriculture to make loans to farmers and ranchers to refiance their debts secured by liens on their real property not to exceed the lesser of the market value of the property of $1 million.
